nodes.text: An elite squadron was active within the Imperial Starfighter Corps of the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War, which lasted from 0 BBY to 5 ABY. The squadron was equipped with TIE Advanced x1 starfighters, and its commander was highly decorated. At one point, a pilot of the squadron attempted to defect from the Empire with their TIE Advanced, but the remaining TIE pilots and the commander were in pursuit with orders to destroy them.
